headline: Fastly Recognized as a Gartner Ⓡ Peer Insights™ Customers’ Choice for Seventh Consecutive Year, Trusted by Customers for Cloud Web Application and API Protection
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, October 01, 2025--Fastly, Inc. (NYSE: FSLY), a leader in global edge cloud platforms, announced today it was named a 2025 Gartner® Peer Insights™ Customers’ Choice for Cloud Web Application and API Protection (WAAP). Fastly received overall high ratings and is the only vendor to earn this recognition for seven consecutive years.
